fields.name: Fqdn
fields.description: The fully-qualified domain name (FQDN) of the Traffic Manager profile. This is formed from the concatenation of the RelativeName with the DNS domain used by Azure Traffic Manager.

fields.name: RelativeName
fields.description: The relative DNS name provided by this Traffic Manager profile. This value is combined with the DNS domain name used by Azure Traffic Manager to form the fully-qualified domain name (FQDN) of the profile.

fields.name: Ttl
fields.description: The DNS Time-To-Live (TTL), in seconds. This informs the local DNS resolvers and DNS clients how long to cache DNS responses provided by this Traffic Manager profile.
